Answer.OptionText: No significant disability; Some symptoms, but work or social life is unaffected.
Slight disability; Work or social life is affected, but able to look after own affairs without assistance.
Moderate disability; Requiring some help, but able to walk unassisted.
Moderately severe disability; Unable to attend to own bodily needs without assistance, and unable to walk unassisted.
Severe disability; Requires constant nursing care and attention, bedridden, incontinent.
Moderate-severe headache, nuchal rigidity, no neurologic deficit other than cranial nerve palsy

FormItem.ItemText: Prognosis on Admission of Aneurysmal Subarachnoid Hemorrhage
FormItem.Expression: 1 + ISNEG( GCS - 15 ) + ISNEG( GCS - 11 ) + ISNEG( GCS - 8) + ISNEG( GCS - 4 )

Answer.OptionText: Intraventicular or parenchymal blood in addition

FormItem.ItemText: Mass effect with focal neurologic deficit

Answer.OptionText: No significant disability despite symptoms; able to carry out all usual duties and activities.
Slight disability; unable to carry out all previous activites, but able to look after own affairs without assistance.
Moderate disability; requiring some help, but able to walk without assistance.
Moderately severe disability; unable to walk without assistance and unable to attend to own bodily needs without assistance.
Severe disability; bedridden, incontinent and requiring constant nursing care and attention.

FormItem.ItemHelp: Use Intervention if there was intervention on ANY aneurysm.

FormItem.ItemText: Sjekk at pasienten er i gruppe 4 - reblødning.
